Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: The eyes those silent tongues of love

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much sanity may be madness and the maddest of all, to see life as it is and not as it should be

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: To be prepared is half the victory

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: Never stand begging for that which you have the power to earn

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth will rise above falsehood as oil above water

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: From reading too much, and sleeping too little, his brain dried up on him and he lost his judgment

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: The knowledge of yourself will preserve you from vanity

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: Valor lies just halfway between rashness and cowardice

Quote.Author: Miguel de Cervantes
Quote.QuoteValue: It is one thing to praise discipline, and another to submit to it

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: A man does not die of love or his liver or even of old age; he dies of being a man

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: Science is a cemetery of dead ideas

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: What we believe to be the motives of our conduct are usually but the pretexts for it

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of good arguments are spoiled by some fool who knows what he is talking about

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: Human beliefs, like all other natural growths, elude the barrier of systems

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: Art distills sensations and embodies it with enhanced meaning

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: Man dies of cold, not of darkness

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: To fall into a habit is to begin to cease to be

Quote.Author: Miguel de Unamuno
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who in discussion relies upon authority uses, not his understanding, but rather his memory

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I love pizza. I want to marry it, but it would just be to eat her family at the wedding

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Pain is funnier than love

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be delusional to be a comedian

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd much rather try and fail than talk about trying

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Shooting a movie isn't good for a sleep disorder

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: I just don't give off a great first impression

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Jokes are so personal, and they bring us together in so many ways

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Creepy people do the things that decent people want to do, but have decided are not a great idea

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy unites, it doesn't divide!

Quote.Author: Mike Birbiglia
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing that you want ever is what you think it is

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: You're never a loser until you quit trying

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: If God had wanted man to play soccer, he wouldn't have given us arms

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not in the parade, you watch the parade. That's life

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: Before you can win, you have to believe you are worthy

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are determined enough and willing to pay the price, you can get it done

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: I do some weights and I do a lot of stretching

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: If things came easy, then everybody would be great at what they did, let's face it

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: Success isn't permanent and failure isn't fatal

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: The ones who want to achieve and win championships motivate themselves

Quote.Author: Mike Ditka
Quote.QuoteValue: Success is measured by your discipline and inner peace

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: Inside every human being there are treasures to unlock

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: Divorce is one of the key predictors of poverty for a child growing up in a home that's broken

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never, ever tasted beer

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is more important to the future of our state than our teachers

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people forget that bipartisanship is really the burden of the victor, not the loser

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: If consumers make better choices, the marketplace will change

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact is, my friends, most Americans don't want more government. They want less government

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always suggested if you can't stand the sight of your own blood, don't run for office

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: The Bible, however, was not created to be amended and altered with each passing culture

Quote.Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote.QuoteValue: I would describe myself as a 'total conservative, a conscientious one.'

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, teamwork is the beauty of our sport, where you have five acting as one. You become selfless

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you're not a human being unless you have doubts and fears

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: You can see and you can listen, but you have to have moments in which you feel

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: Each group and each youngster is different. As a leader or coach, you get to know what they need

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is that many people set rules to keep from making decisions

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted to teach

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: With me and basketball, it became part of me

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: Throughout my life, my mom has been the person that I've always looked up to

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: I hated to lose

Quote.Author: Mike Krzyzewski
Quote.QuoteValue: Imagination has a great deal to do with winning

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: Despite the hysteria from the political class and the media, smoking doesn't kill

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in servant leadership, and the servant always asks, 'Where am I needed most?'

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: Donald Trump is a good man, and he will make a great president of the United States of America

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: Well the truth is, Republicans didn't just lose a few elections, we lost our way

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Christian, a conservative, and a Republican, in that order

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: Human cloning is coming

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time for conservative Americans to right the ship again

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time for conservative Americans to do what Reagan did

Quote.Author: Mike Pence
Quote.QuoteValue: The Patriot Act is essential to our continued success in the war on terror here at home

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a plan 'till they get punched in the mouth

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as we persevere and endure, we can get anything we want

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest weakness is my sensitivity. I am too sensitive a person

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't understand why people would want to get rid of pigeons. They don't bother no one

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I ain't the same person I was when I bit that guy's ear off

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to do what I do best, and that's fight. I love it

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: You come home, and you party. But after that, you get a hangover. Everything about that is negative

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like sometimes that I was not meant for this society

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to conquer people and their souls

Quote.Author: Mike Tyson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you see me smash somebody's skull, you enjoy it

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: Idealism is the despot of thought, just as politics is the despot of will

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: Where the state begins, individual liberty ceases, and vice versa

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: The passion for destruction is also a creative passion

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: Therefore, if God existed, only in one way could he serve human liberty - by ceasing to exist

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: If there is a State, then there is domination, and in turn, there is slavery

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: I bow before the authority of special men because it is imposed upon me by my own reason

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: The freedom of all is essential to my freedom

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone who makes plans for after the revolution is a reactionary

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: From each according to his faculties; to each according to his needs

Quote.Author: Mikhail Bakunin
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything will pass, and the world will perish but the Ninth Symphony will remain

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not try to dance better than anyone else. I only try to dance better than myself

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: Your heart is very much connected to your mind

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: Dancers are made, not born

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: People of art should never get married and have children, because it's a selfish experience

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to do exactly what I want to do. I'd rather gamble on the box office than beg for a grant

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to make my own mistakes

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: The essence of all art is to have pleasure in giving pleasure

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: The more injuries you get, the smarter you get

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel very uneasy with a lot of aspects of the Russian life and the Russian people

Quote.Author: Mikhail Baryshnikov
Quote.QuoteValue: No dancer can watch Fred Astaire and not know that we all should have been in another business

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: If not me, who? And if not now, when?

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: The world will not accept dictatorship or domination

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: If what you have done yesterday still looks big to you, you haven't done much today

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: If people don't like Marxism, they should blame the British Museum

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: I paid too heavy a price for perestroika

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: What we need is Star Peace and not Star Wars

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes when you stand face to face with someone, you cannot see his face

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: Jesus was the first socialist, the first to seek a better life for mankind

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: More socialism means more democracy, openness and collectivism in everyday life

Quote.Author: Mikhail Gorbachev
Quote.QuoteValue: Democracy must learn to defend itself

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: Business has only two functions - marketing and innovation

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening to a news broadcast is like smoking a cigarette and crushing the butt in the ashtray

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: Culture is perishing in overproduction, in an avalanche of words, in the madness of quantity

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: He took over anger to intimidate subordinates, and in time anger took over him

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: How goodness heightens beauty!

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: All great novels, all true novels, are bisexual

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: Optimism is the opium of the people

Quote.Author: Milan Kundera
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter how much we scorn it, kitsch is an integral part of the human condition

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is all about having a good time

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Anyone that hates on you is always below you, because they're just jealous of what you have

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: If you believe in yourself anything is possible

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Pink isn't just a color, it's an attitude!

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that turning on the charm without being fake is really important

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: People like controversy because that's what sells

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not very good at keeping secrets at all! If you want your secret kept do not tell me!

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to sleep. I'd sleep all day if I could

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: I need more friends. It's kind of like my quest right now just to have more true friends

Quote.Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote.QuoteValue: I think my dad is a lot cooler than other dads. He still acts like he's still 17

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: It makes so much sense to just love what you do and go to work every day to get to get to work

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Working, for me, is like a gift

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I have two hands: one for me, one for other people

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm keeping the pixie. I hope I inspire people... it's really cool to have short hair

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, I just do my job. I love my art

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very generous, and I really want people to see that I am - that's really it

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really small, so I think if I shrink, I'd turn into a puddle

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I write many essays on whales. I love whales, especially orcas. And dolphins

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: With my platform, anyway, I want to try and do good things and want to help people

Quote.Author: Millie Bobby Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I never liked sleeping in the dark. I have, like, twinkle stars around my bed, so it's not so bad

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: I care about facts. I don't care about your feelings

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every racist joke is a scientific fact

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminism is cancer

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: Feminism is like any female-dominated group - a perpetual catfight

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see it as a bad thing that I surround myself with edgy people. Because they're interesting

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: I love myself. I am the best person I know

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: Calvin Coolidge was one of the best presidents. Why? Because he did absolutely nothing

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to crack jokes about people. That is my right

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to think of myself as a virtuous troll

Quote.Author: Milo Yiannopoulos
Quote.QuoteValue: I do say things in a way that is going to elicit a response from people

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is an instant vacation

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: You can lead a man to Congress, but you can't make him think

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: Poverty is not a disgrace, but it's terribly inconvenient

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: If evolution really works, how come mothers only have two hands?

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: I just filled out my income tax forms. Who says you can't get killed by a blank?

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is what you have after you've forgotten her name

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: A committee is a group that keeps minutes and loses hours

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: We owe a lot to Thomas Edison - if it wasn't for him, we'd be watching television by candlelight

Quote.Author: Milton Berle
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can't buy you happiness, but it helps you look for it in a lot more places

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as a free lunch

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: The government solution to a problem is usually as bad as the problem

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Hell hath no fury like a bureaucrat scorned

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Concentrated power is not rendered harmless by the good intentions of those who create it

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Columbus did not seek a new route to the Indies in response to a majority directive

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Inflation is taxation without legislation

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: The only relevant test of the validity of a hypothesis is comparison of prediction with experience

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: We have a system that increasingly taxes work and subsidizes nonwork

Quote.Author: Milton Friedman
Quote.QuoteValue: Governments never learn. Only people learn

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: Between flattery and admiration there often flows a river of contempt

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is a good teacher, but she sends in terrific bills

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: The drama of life begins with a wail and ends with a sigh

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: The difference between a saint and a hypocrite is that one lies for his religion, the other by it

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: To be loved is to be fortunate, but to be hated is to achieve distinction

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: A fool bolts pleasure, then complains of moral indigestion

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: A homely face and no figure have aided many women heavenward

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: Love often wears a mask in order to test loyalty

Quote.Author: Minna Antrim
Quote.QuoteValue: Intuition is truly a feminine quality, but women should not mistake rash conclusions for this gift

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love a red lip, especially when I am feeling tired, as it brightens my whole face

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I live by the 80/20 rule: I'm 80 percent healthy, and then 20 percent indulgent

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I really feel that my body craves to be in the mountains or by the ocean or in the countryside

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I always see myself as, like, equal to everyone

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a weird sense of humour. My dad's the same. We love watching 'Monty Python' together

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in celebrating the female figure and embracing what we've been given, not hiding that

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I love going for walks and like to do fun active things outdoors

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: Some sunshine is good for the soul, but I always make sure I wear a big hat

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: I collect underwear from my travels. Lace, lingerie, bodysuits... they're like souvenirs

Quote.Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote.QuoteValue: To wake up to the sound of my son saying 'Mama, mama!' It's the best sound ever

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a comfortable old age and to be looked after - I have arthritis - and money is a factor

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a very positive attitude towards rappers

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately, I don't know many black people

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: I think all actors get scared because we're frightened to disappoint

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: I may have a talent for acting, but I am incapable of doing anything else

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: The first piece of property that I bought was in Tuscany in 1973

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: Old people have a much better time in India because they're respected

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a class prejudice - against the upper class, which is foolish

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: If I could give my younger self one piece of advice, I would say, 'Lose weight.'

Quote.Author: Miriam Margolyes
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to be 75 in May. How can I have lived this long and not know anything?

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, when it's time to rhyme rhyme, I can get down for mine

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't want to be a genius! That ain't cool

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody is doing the same old thing

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: Hip-hop is definitely not what it used to be, which was creative, original music

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: Now everybody's sampling

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: Music should be your escape

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a person that's walkin' down the street looking mean all day

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: I got a mother who's very strong after taking the whippings that she took from my father

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my mother. She's my first love. She has been through a lot and is a sole survivor

Quote.Author: Missy Elliott
Quote.QuoteValue: The double chin's not good for the red carpet

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: More often than we realize, people see in us what we don't see in ourselves

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like with 'On the Town,' it was the perfect production and the perfect opportunity

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: To be empathetic to everyone around you, I think, is such a powerful thing to hold

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: Ballet was so structured. I'd been craving something that could guide me

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: Every time I dance, I'm trying to prove myself to myself

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: I've gotten nothing but warmth from the Black community and positive feedback

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: My childhood is a part of my story, and it's why I'm who I am today and why my career is what it is

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: I was definitely a late bloomer and didn't really come into my own until I was probably in my 20s

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: I had always been proud of my body - its strength and grace enabled me to pursue my passions

Quote.Author: Misty Copeland
Quote.QuoteValue: Finding ballet was like finding this missing piece of myself

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: Leadership - leadership is about taking responsibility, not making excuses

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty analytical guy, all right?

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is the investment our generation makes in the future

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: When sperm and egg unite, something goes from inanimate to animate. It is life

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: The invisible hand of the market always moves faster and better than the heavy hand of government

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time for the party of big ideas, not the party of Big Brother!

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad had been born in Mexico and his family had to leave during the Mexican revolution

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: Obamacare was very attractive, particularly to those without health insurance

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't look back. I look forward

Quote.Author: Mitt Romney
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a PC. My sons have a Mac and swear by it, but I have a couple PC's

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: There is so much to discover in Dubai

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: What drives me is winning medals and going out there and enjoying it

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: This picture has been painted of me. It's not right. I am 100% clean

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: I love what I do. I want to continue winning medals

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: On the track, you know what you're capable of, but being at the birth, you have no control

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm probably a lot more closer in the 1500m to the world record than I am in the 5000m

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: The coach is the boss at the end of the day. I do whatever he tells me and don't ask questions

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: What do you want to be? If you don't put the work in, you're not going to be able to be it

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: I always learn something from every race

Quote.Author: Mo Farah
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just grateful I have a British passport and a country here

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: If I was a sex symbol, I would be getting laid a lot more than I am now

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: I still never get recognized. Small, bald white guys like myself - we all kind of look the same

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm like a monk with a taste for hookers

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: But at the same time, I don't let myself regret things to the point that I'm paralyzed

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: I find myself for whatever reason unable to live in the apartment I renovate and have to sell

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: I buy things with the best of intention of living in them and then life intercedes

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: I was on food stamps until I was 18 and became an adult

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd much rather go to a Banksy art show than a Moby art show. My art is painfully naive

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is that genetics has robbed me of hair. But it's not interesting to blame genetics

Quote.Author: Moby
Quote.QuoteValue: In a perfect world, I would be 6-foot-3 and have a perfect head of hair and look like Orlando Bloom

Quote.Author: Mohammed Saeed a
Quote.QuoteValue: ahaf - There is no presence of American infidels in the city of Baghdad
